attributes.action: hold a General Election as soon as possible.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The decision by Gordon Brown not to hold an election this Autumn is one based upon self interest and a false belief in his own abilities.  The British Public demands that he go to the Country forthwith.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
